official_title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-Oxepanone polymer with 1,4-butanediol and 5-isocyanato-1-(isocyanatomethyl)-1,3,3-trimethylcyclohexane , 2-ethyl-1-hexanol-blocked.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-Oxepanone polymer with 1,4-butanediol and 5-isocyanato-1-(isocyanatomethyl)-1,3,3-trimethylcyclohexane , 2-ethyl-1-hexanol-blocked.

titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-Oxepanone polymer with 1,4-butanediol and 5-isocyanato-1-(isocyanatomethyl)-1,3,3-trimethylcyclohexane , 2-ethyl-1-hexanol-blocked.
